text: Ballotpedia is a non-partisan online political encyclopedia. Founded in 2007, it covers American federal, state, and local politics, elections, and public policy. Ballotpedia is sponsored by the Lucy Burns Institute, a non-profit organization based in Middleton, Wisconsin. According to their website, the organization employed over 60 writers and researchers in 2016. ==Other websites== * Category:Encyclopedia websites Category:MediaWiki websites Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:American websites
title: Ballotpedia
